wordGroup: hurricane katrina 卡特里娜飓风
hurricane lamp n. 防风灯；飓风灯；马灯

sentences.en: Sometimes a nor'easter can be worse than a hurricane.
sentences.cn: 一场东北风暴有时比一次飓风还糟糕。

sentences.en: Hurricane Betty is now approaching the coast of Florida.
sentences.cn: 飓风贝蒂正在逼近佛罗里达海岸。

sentences.en: The eye of the hurricane hit Florida just south of Miami.
sentences.cn: 飓风中心袭击了迈阿密正南面的佛罗里达州。
